title: Sri Lanka kicks off 14th population and housing census from the President’s House.
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) The 14th Census of Population and Housing conducted by the Department of Census and Statistics of the Ministry of Finance and Planning was inaugurated today on 27 February at the President’s House with the participation of President Mahinda Rajapaksa. The official 2012 Census kicked off…
